channel.title: Life on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff

item.title: Another Month Rolls By
item.description: After much procrastinating we made a start to the fire, Built up the back and sides with some small bricks then we tiled the hearth with black tiles. We ran out of time to do the surround, that will have to wait for another day.
